JobFullDesc: The Safety Team's goal is to make Uber the safest and most trusted transportation choice, and to support customers, drivers, and couriers with empathy and care if things go wrong.This role requires a broad range of design skills — but we will also help you hone your craft and develop new capabilities. Uber is looking to set the global standard for ridesharing safety, and you can help drive that future!  What You'll Do Thoughtfully solve problems for our users and for our businessWork closely with research, product, and engineering partners to deeply understand issues related to our core payment experience, define design requirements, and identify future opportunitiesDesign artifacts that provide the right level of detail at each stage of the product development process -- from presentations that communicate design strategy to pixel-perfect prototypes for engineersRegularly participate in design critiques with Uber's world-class design team and ship high quality end-to-end experiencesUltimately, your work will help millions of people every day around the world!What You’ll Need 5+ years experience as a product designerProficient in English (oral & written)Ability to think beyond the digital screen and design for human emotions and interactions in the physical worldQuick visual communication, including sketches, wireframes, and flow diagramsAbility to conduct evaluative research, including usability tests, heuristic reviews, and competitive analysisExperience using existing design systems to deliver usable and elegant solutionsAbility to tackle complex design problems for global marketsA portfolio showing your high quality, thoughtful UI and UX workEffective prototyping skillsA track record of shipping phenomenal design, and an understanding of what details matter at each stage of the release cycleBe a collaborative teammate, ability to partner with different functions
